attributes.action: Enforce Better Access Rights for Fathers
attributes.additional_details: Children need their fathers too! A fathers role, as long as there is not a valid reason to prevent them from gaining access to visitation with their children, is just as vital as a mothers, yet day after day fathers are being denied access to their children without good reason. Fathers have very little rights once a relationship breaks down and this is wrong! Nobody should have he right to stop a child from having a relationship with a parent. More needs to be done to ensure this stops.
attributes.background: Fathers all over the UK are struggling to gain access to their children follow a relationship break down. They can try and fight this busy going to court and paying ridiculous fees for a contact order but once in the place, if the mothers still refuses access there is little that can be done.

rejection.details: The Courts are responsible for enforcing the law. You could start a petition calling for law to be changed or for specific rights to be enshrined in law.
